resources.string: Log in now to access all the features Big Blue has to offer!
Please enter your info to create an account. All fields are required. Password must be at least 6 characters. Phone number must be a US-format 11 digit number, no special characters.
Please enter the email address of your account to receive a password reset email. Once sent, you can follow the instructions in the email to reset your account's password.
Reset email has been sent to the provided address.
Current account is not verified. Verify account via link sent to specified email address.
Account creation success. Verification email sent to:
Verification email has been sent. Proceed to email for verification.
Email Address error. Verification Email has not been sent.
This email address is not linked to a Big Blue Ocean account. Please contact Big Blue Ocean to add this email or become a customer.
Welcome to the Big Blue Ocean mobile app. In this section, you can review the application\'s features in order to streamline your experience.
Here you can select a type of fish and specify your needs. It will be added to your \"My Order\" tab for review.
Here you can view announcements and news updates presented by Big Blue Ocean.
Here you can review, edit, or clear your order. Submitting will send it to your salesperson for review. Try adding something from the \"Products\" tab!
Your salesperson will reach out to you shortly to help you place your order. For clarification, this message is NOT a confirmation of an official order.
Something went wrong and your order could not be submitted. Please reach out to Big Blue.
By confirming, you will submit your current order list to your salesperson. Your order will be reviewed by your salesperson, who will then contact you to place your order officially.
By clearing, you will remove all items in your current list. Do you still wish to continue?
Please enter how many pounds of this fish you would like:
Please enter your desired price per pound of this fish:
